column2: # Function to create and print a frequency table for a specified column
cat("\nFrequency table for", col_name, ":\n")  # Print header
freq_tab <- sort(table(data[[col_name]]), decreasing = TRUE)  # Create sorted frequency table
# Loop through each level and print on a separate line
cat(freq, "--------", freq_tab[[freq]], "\n")  # Print category and count
# Generate frequency tables for key categorical variables
